Installation¶

AMrotor was tested on Matlab R2020a, but should also work with older Matlab-versions.

Necessary Matlab-toolboxes are:

  • Symbolic Math Toolbox

  • Curve Fitting Toolbox (for some special applications e.g. Fourierorbitdarstellung)

First step¶

The folder of AMrotor needs to be in the Matlab-path. Afterwards the necessary scripts can be executed (see Examples and Usage).

Source¶

The source code of AMrotor can be downloaded from https://gitlab.lrz.de/jmaierhofer/AMrotor
